data.representation.images.sift

Class LFeatRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataSet
      • data.representation.images.sift.LFeatRepresentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredSIFTRepresentation

    public class LFeatRepresentation
extends DataSet
    This class implements a container for individual local features that can be used as a feature representation of an individual image.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Calculates the X, Y coordinates of the SIFT centroid of a cluster. Used in SIFT quantization during codebook generation.
